episode: I have a cruise coming up in a few weeks and I am absolutely thrilled and excited as I look forward to the vacation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have a cruise coming up in a few short weeks and I am thrilled and excited as the trip gets closer and closer.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: How splendid! Cruises can be such a delightful escape. Do you have any specific plans for when you're on board?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well it is a music cruise with around thirty bands on board so it is basically constant concerts.  I will definitely be getting my fill of music.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds absolutely incredible! You're in for a spectacular time.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have done cruises like this in the past and I always have an absolute blast.  I can barely control my excitement!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like a blast! Enjoy every moment of it!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I definitely will.  It ports for two days so I am looking forward to some beach time and some rest and relaxation as well.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds divine! Enjoy the sun and tranquility!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I will.  My only concern is that I tend to get motion sickness and have gotten sick on cruises in the past so I have some Dramimine packed and ready to go.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Smart thinking! Hopefully, it does the trick.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It usually does.  If I remember to take it!  Now I just have to make it through a couple more weeks of work.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Hang in there, the reward will be worth it!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is what I keep telling myself!  Work seems to drag as time gets closer and closer to a vacation but it will be well worth the wait.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely worth it! Time will fly by!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I sure hope so!  As long as it does not fly by while I am on the actual cruise!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: May time slow for your enjoyment!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you!  This is going to be my tenth cruise.  I am starting to feel like a regular!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're quite the seasoned cruiser!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am definitely getting there.  Thank you for all of the kind words.  I cannot wait until we sail off!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Wishing you smooth sailing and endless fun!
